This class contains the 2D and 3D templates for matching. More...

Detailed Description

This class contains the 2D and 3D templates for matching.

Author:
Social Robot

Template::Template ( cv::Mat  template2d,
cv::Mat  template3d 
)

Constructor given 2D and 3D templates.

Parameters:
template2d A Mat containing a binary image.
template3d A Mat containing a grayscale image. Notice that template3d is a grayscale image, it is used 3d when the matching is done with the depth image.
